about.description: Trid UI is a lightweight desktop application that provides a user-friendly interface for TrID, a powerful tool for scanning and analyzing files.
about.made_by: This application was created by Cufiy and is based on the original TrID software developed by Marco Pontello. The app icon is based on eye icon by icons8.com

home.click_to_browse: Click to browse or drag a file here
home.files_processed_locally: Files are processed locally, nothing is uploaded
home.no_matches_explanation: TrID could not identify this file type. It may be a rare or custom format.
home.definitions_not_found_explanation: TrID definitions are required to scan files. Please download them to continue.

settings.definitions_not_found_explanation: Download the definitions file to enable file identification.
settings.definitions_info: TrID definitions are updated regularly by Marco Pontello to support 						new file types.
settings.language_disclaimer: This translation may not be perfect. If you find any issues, please report them on GitHub.
settings.language_help_translation: If you want to help improve translations, please visit our GitHub Issues page.
settings.max_visible_matches_description: Number of matches to show initially (1-50)
settings.confidence_threshold_description: Hide matches below this confidence percentage
settings.max_total_results_description: Maximum number of results from scan (0 = unlimited)
settings.reset_settings_description: Reset all settings to their default values. This will restore language, theme, search engine, and scan display preferences.
settings.auto_update_definitions_description: Automatically download and install definition updates when the app starts
settings.check_app_updates: Check for app updates on startup
settings.check_app_updates_description: Automatically check for new app versions when the app starts
